Name: Rider of the Primal Storm

Combos.Name: Great Bolt
Combos.Effects: Attack target crackles with a static charge. If they don't end their next turn adjacent to another character, they take [D]+[fray] again, then this effect ends.

Actions.Name: Jolt
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 takes [fray] damage. They must then save or become winded and have their polarity flipped. Winded foes fail the save.

Actions.Name: Joyous Combat
Actions.Description: All adjacent foes must choose: be shoved 2, or take [D]+[fray] from the Rider.

Actions.Name: Sturmreiten
Actions.Description: The Rider becomes intangible, then flies 5 in a straight line with phasing. All characters they pass through take [fray] damage. Then, this effect ends.

PhasesDescription: The Rider enters its second phase when bloodied.
